entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 12:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -41.9°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 52 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:08 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blizzard developing late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 12:08 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late in the morning then sunny. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 12:08 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
